MessagePriorityEnumType.description: With what priority should this message be shown

MessageStateEnumType.description: During what state should this message be shown. When omitted this message should be shown in any state of the Charging Station.

name.description: Name of the component. Name should be taken from the list of standardized component names whenever possible. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

instance.description: Name of instance in case the component exists as multiple instances. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

id.description: EVSE Identifier. This contains a number (> 0) designating an EVSE of the Charging Station.

connectorId.description: An id to designate a specific connector (on an EVSE) by connector index number.

MessageContentType.description: Contains message details, for a message to be displayed on a Charging Station.

language.description: Message language identifier. Contains a language code as defined in <<ref-RFC5646,[RFC5646]>>.

content.description:
*(2.1)* Required. Message contents. +
Maximum length supported by Charging Station is given in OCPPCommCtrlr.FieldLength["MessageContentType.content"].
    Maximum length defaults to 1024.

MessageInfoType.description: Contains message details, for a message to be displayed on a Charging Station.

id.description: Unique id within an exchange context. It is defined within the OCPP context as a positive Integer value (greater or equal to zero).

startDateTime.description: From what date-time should this message be shown. If omitted: directly.

endDateTime.description: Until what date-time should this message be shown, after this date/time this message SHALL be removed.

transactionId.description:
During which transaction shall this message be shown.
Message SHALL be removed by the Charging Station after transaction has
ended.

CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

requestId.description: The id of the <<getdisplaymessagesrequest,GetDisplayMessagesRequest>> that requested this message.

tbc.description: "to be continued" indicator. Indicates whether another part of the report follows in an upcoming NotifyDisplayMessagesRequest message. Default value when omitted is false.
